title: Item Visually inspect the fire extinguisher bottle thermal d…
caption_en: Item Visually inspect the fire extinguisher bottle thermal discharge (red) and manual discharge (yellow) indicators for integrity. Inform the maintenance crew if any of the discs is missing or discoloured. JR So _

title: Item Check the extinguisher pressure gauge for proper pressu…
caption_en: Item Check the extinguisher pressure gauge for proper pressure. The 2 engine fire extinguisher containers are located in the Tail-cone Equipment Bay. The extinguishing agent, Halon is stored under pressure. Depending on the compartment temperature, the normal pressure should be between - psi. JR So _

title: Item Check engine oil quantity gauges and service engine oil…
caption_en: Item Check engine oil quantity gauges and service engine oil if necessary within one hour of engine shutdown. Record uplift in fuel and oil log. If oil level is not checked within 1 hour after engine shutdown, perform a normal engine start and allow engine to run up at least 5 minutes. Then check engine oil quantity. JR So _

title: Open the engine oil access door. Note that on the left engin…
caption_en: Open the engine oil access door. Note that on the left engine, there is only one dip stick. The right engine has 2 types of dip sticks. J JR So _

title: Use only approved engine oil for servicing. We use Mobil Jet…
caption_en: Use only approved engine oil for servicing. We use Mobil Jet Oil Type 2 for this engine. J JR So _

title: Oil servicing - Left Engine 1. Remove the dipstick after pus…
caption_en: Oil servicing - Left Engine 1. Remove the dipstick after pushing it down and rotating counterclockwise. 2. Check oil level against markings on dipstick. 3. If oil level indication is below FULL, add oil. 4. After servicing, re-install the dipstick and close the oil access door. J JR So _

title: Qil servicing - Right Engine 1. Remove the dipstick by flipp…
caption_en: Qil servicing - Right Engine 1. Remove the dipstick by flipping the yellow tab and rotating it counterclockwise. 2. Check oil level against markings on dipstick. 3. If oil level indication is below FULL, add oil. 4. After servicing, re-install the dipstick and close the oil access door. I JR So _

title: Record the oil uplift into the Fuel Oil log. J JR So _
caption_en: Record the oil uplift into the Fuel Oil log. J JR So _
